# Constant URI

<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->

Generates a constant URI.

## Parameter

### Value

The constant URI to be generated

- ID: `value`
- Datatype: `uri`
- Default Value: `owl:Class`

## Advanced Parameter

`None`
